attributes.review:
i was on my way to download this app to show support to my one and only orange🍊😻 when suddenly i was greeted by hackers collecting all of my data and sending me secret messages begging me to give this 5 stars before i could even sign up!!! i am truley scared for my life and i will never open this app again for my safety. i hope you do the same💕

best wishes,

zuko😼
attributes.title: traumatizing😰
